Articles.Content: Same everything as last version (which had mods), but a fewer part count ship; my 1,000 part ships lagged less in the last version (I am using a 300 part ship with fairings).
I have heard anecdotal evidence that the fairings could be causing the lag. What happens when you load one of your 1,000 part ships from .90?

\*waits 10 seconds per click....

![1-1.gif](http://www.ajaxload.info/cache/FF/FF/FF/00/00/00/1-1.gif)...

Okay laptop, you can let me open craft that are not lag generators....

...It loaded!

it is like 5-7 times faster, no delay for clicking.
Is there a fix or something for fairing lag?
